entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow in Forillon Park. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 except northwest 60 gusting to 90 in Forillon Park. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
